user_instruction: 'Tell Jane to reply to me (mark@technotronix.com) about Eric'"'"'s recent absences and review Eric'"'"'s personal file in Gmail for the relevant information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Information on Eric’s Recent Absences

Hi Jane,

Hope you’re doing well. Could you please review Eric’s recent attendance record and let me know if there are any underlying issues or documentation that explain his absences? When you have a moment, please also look over Eric’s personnel file stored in Gmail to see if there’s anything relevant we should consider.

Kindly reply to me at mark@technotronix.com with any findings or next steps.

Thank you for your help.

Best regards,
Mark

final_output:
